sentences.english: Do you want to wake the dragon, you stupid little whore?
sentences.chinese: 你想喚醒真龍之怒嗎，你這個小賤貨？

sentences.english: If you are a shallow bitch, I can be a blunt jerk.
sentences.chinese: 如果妳是膚淺的賤貨，那我可能是直率的混蛋。

sentences.english: What was more annoying was Jezebel getting any attention at all.
sentences.chinese: 賤貨越讓人討厭越能得到關注。

sentences.english: Whilst your brother sows his wild oats in the South of France with his floozy ?
sentences.chinese: 而你的兄弟在法國南邊和他的賤貨一起種麥子麼？

sentences.english: So Rhett consorted with that vile Watling creature and gave her money.
sentences.chinese: 這樣看來，瑞德在同沃特琳那個賤貨來往並給她錢了。

sentences.english: And a homosexual that NO ONE LIKES.
sentences.chinese: 他是個小賤貨，一個沒有人喜歡的同性戀。

sentences.english: Why didn't you tell me that bitch was coming so fucking early?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼不告訴我這個賤貨來的這麼早呢？

sentences.english: Keep it up. I'll spray you the face, bitch.
sentences.chinese: 再廢話，我就往你臉上噴這個，小賤貨。

definition: to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
to talk drivel/to make irresponsible remarks
to mix/to blend/(fig.) to spoil/to mess up things/to run around with (sb)/to get involved with/to mix (with other people)
to make an exhibition of oneself/to be a disgrace
(dialect) hen/prostitute/(Tw) interfering/nosy/busybody (from Taiwanese 家婆, Tai-lo pr. [ke-pô])
lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
to play dirty tricks/to be up to mischief
